amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the return of members of the Armed Forces to active service upon rehabilitation from service-related injuries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3482 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3482 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7270-7273; text: CR S7273) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the return of members of the Armed Forces to active service upon rehabilitation from service-related injuries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3482 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3482 proposed by Senator Warner.
